timeline.description: Leading product strategy and development for AI-powered automation solutions in hospitality and real estate sectors.
Led development of major telecom projects including Rakuten Mobile and MANO orchestration platform; mentored team members and managed client delivery.
Developed network operations dashboard using GWT for enterprise clients; focused on widget development and maintenance.
Built customer portal for managed hosting and cloud services; implemented forms, dashboards, and query optimization.
Developed PLM solutions and engineering services for global clients; built web services, GUI apps, automation scripts, and reports.
